resources.string: RAM 3 GB INTERNAL 32 GB Camera 23Mp Size 5.2 inch Global Stable Official MIUI Garansi Distributor

Network Technology\n\n
GSM / HSPA / LTE\n\n
Launch Announced 2015,September\n\n
Status Available. Released 2015, October\n\n
Body Dimensions 146 x 72 x 7.3 mm (5.75 x 2.83 x 0.29 in)\n\n
Weight 154g(5.43 oz)\n\n
Build Front/back glass, aluminum frame\n\n
SIM Nano-SIM\n\n
IP68 dust/water proof (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)\n\n
Display Type IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors\n\n
Size 5.2 inches, 73.2 cm2 (~69.6% screen-to-body ratio)\n\n
Resolution 1080 x 1920 pixels, 16:9 ratio(~428 ppi density)\n\n
Protection Scratch-resistant glass, oleophobic coating\n\n
Triluminos display\n\n
X-Reality Engine\n\n
Platform OS Android 5.1.1 (Lollipop), upgradable to 7.1.1 (Nougat)\n\n
Chipset Qualcomm MSM8994 Snapdragon 810 (20 nm)\n\n
CPU Octa-core (4x1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 & 4x2.0 GHz Cortex-A57)\n\n
GPU Adreno 430\n\n
Memory Card slot microSD, up to 256 GB (dedicated slot)\n\n
Internal 32GB, 3GB RAM\n\n
Main Camera Single 23MP, f/2.0, 24mm(wide), 1/2.3", PDAF\n\n Features LEDflash, HDR, panorama
Video 2160p@30fps, 1080p@60fps, 720p@120fps, HDR
Selfie camera Single 5.1 MP, f/2.4
Features HDR
Video 1080p@30fps
Sound Loudspeaker Yes, with stereo speakers
3.5mm jack Yes
24-bit/192kHz audio
Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
Comms WLAN Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot
Bluetooth 4.1, A2DP, aptX
GPS Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS/ BDS(market dependant)
NFC Yes
Radio FMradio, RDS
USB microUSB 2.0 (MHL 3 TV-out), USB Host
Features Sensors Fingerprint (side-mounted; EU model only), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
ANT+
Battery Non-removable Li-Ion 2900 mAh battery
Charging Fast battery charging 18W (Quick Charge 2.0)
Stand-by Up to 520 h (2G) / Up to 540 h (3G)
Talk time Up to 13 h 10 min (2G) / Up to 17 h (3G)
Music play Up to 87 h
Misc Colors White, Graphite Black, Gold, Green, Pink
Models E6653, SO-01H, SOV32, E6603, 501SO
SAR 0.55 W/kg(head) 0.64 W/kg (body)
SAR EU 0.75 W/kg(head) 0.78 W/kg (body)
Price About 170 EUR
Tests Performance Basemark OS II: 1354 / Basemark OS II 2.0: 1580
Basemark X: 24941
Display Contrast ratio: 986 (nominal), 2.88(sunlight)
Camera Photo/Video
Loudspeaker Voice 65dB / Noise 62dB / Ring 66dB
Audio quality Noise -95.5dB / Crosstalk -94.8dB
Battery life
Endurance rating 48h
